channel.title: Maccy
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.description:
• Support Simplified Chinese localization
  • Ignore KeeWeb application copies by default
  • Allow to turn off/on by clicking menu bar icon with OPTION (‚å•) pressed
  • Improve searching and pinning for similarly looking history items
  • Immediately resize image history items when changing image height in preferences
  • Do not hide pinned items when the menu size is limited and pinned items are shown at the bottom
